definitions.definition: The physical quality which is given by the degree of firmness, solidity, density, and viscosity; consistency.
The staying together, or remaining in close relation, of non-physical things.
definitions.example: Her performance has lacked consistence over the last year.

definitions.definition: Standing still; quiescence; state of rest.
The condition of standing or adhering together, or being fixed in union, as the parts of a body; existence; firmness; coherence; solidity.
That which stands together as a united whole; a combination.
